#include <stdio.h>

int main () {
  int tcase, c;
  long int a, b;
  long long int l ;
  scanf ( "%d", &tcase ) ;
  while ( tcase -- ) {
    scanf ( "%ld %ld %lld", &a, &b, &l ) ;
    l = l % (a+b) ;
    if ( l > 0 && l <= a )
      printf ( "Aman\n" ) ;
    else printf ( "Anish\n" ) ;
  }
  return 0;
}
